parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: A prolonged form of an otherwise obsolete verb; to talk, i.e. Utter words.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.

parse: Verb - Present Infinitive Middle or Passive
str2: Properly, to distinguish, i.e. Decide; by implication, to try, condemn, punish.
A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
Freedom, liberty, especially: a state of freedom from slavery. From eleutheros; freedom.
